item.title: As stocks wobbled, the S&P 500 held a critical threshold. Here’s what history says happens next.
item.description: The benchmark index has been above its 50-day moving average for 133 sessions, the longest streak since 2007. But that nearly came to an end on Friday...

item.title: Bitcoin rebounds after a dip into bear-market territory. Are buyers coming back for crypto?
item.description: The token’s break below $100,000 earlier this week could be a warning of more losses ahead, one analyst says.

item.title: ‘We can’t afford to buy a house’: My husband and I are building a house on my mother-in-law’s land. Are we asking for trouble?
item.description: “A single-family home where we live costs $600,000 or more.”

item.title: I’m 83 and will have $500K if I sell my house. My estranged wife wants me to join her in Colombia. Do I go?
item.description: “I can just barely handle my expenses with a mortgage payment of $984 and an income of $3,800.”

item.title: Expedia is treating AI as a friend rather than a mortal enemy — and its stock is soaring
item.description: Expedia shares climbed to a record close as the online travel agent has embraced AI to help boost business, rather than try to find ways to beat it.
